titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate and the House of Representatives.
A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate and the House of Representatives.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from June 9, 2004, until June 14, 2004, and an adjournment of the House of Representatives from June 9, 2004, until June 14, 2004.
